What if there exists another world beyond lucid dreaming? That is where those who have been stolen of their dreams gather. Do Shi-Eon, who escapes reality by lucid dreaming, loses his dream and falls into the space of 'Shared Dream.' Now he must fight to reclaim his dream.

現実には興味がない。なぜなら俺にとっての「現実」とはあの世界だけだから…。 ここは、夢だということを自覚して見る夢。自分の思い通りの世界を創り出せる、自分だけの場所…だったはずが、この世界にいるのは俺だけじゃなかった！？

description.en:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
description.ko:
최강의 무가 사미온에서 외팔이 방계로 태어난 데이븐.
반쪽짜리 무인이라며 갖은 조롱과 멸시를 딛고 사미온의 직계 천재마저 넘어섰으나,
결국 가문과 부모에게 버림받아 가장 초라한 최후를 맞이하게 되는 줄 알았는데...
500년 뒤 새로운 몸에서 눈을 떴다!

‘내게도 오른팔이 있다?’

새로운 가문의 적통.
천부적인 재능의 육체.
전생의 경험.
그리고 그와 함께하는 신까지.

환생을 했더니, 모든 것이 달라져 있었다.

description.en:
1-3. **Love Knife**: Afraid of being alienated, Asahi doesn’t say what she really thinks. Sou, who is always true to himself, has Asahi’s admiration. She is about to go to a love hotel with her boyfriend that she doesn’t even like, Youhei, and gets saved by Sou… The admiration for Sou starts turning into love. Even if she turns everyone around her into an enemy, she chooses Sou but…!?  
  
4. **Antique Girl**  
  
5.  **Tea Time wa Mayonaka ni**

description.en:
“I will never cuckold you!”

A young man reincarnated as a villain character in a game tries to live an honest life to avoid a bad ending, but for some reason he ends up becoming friends with the heroines...!?

“Dungeon Brave Soul”
It is a game that drew in many men, and at the same time, it is a game that broke the brains of many men with its sequel's NTR, depression, and bad ending.

All because of the overwhelmingly hated antagonist of “Dunbure 2”――

 The young man who was reincarnated as Zenon Baskerville, however, in order to avoid the bad ending according to the scenario of "Dunbure 2", He tries to live honestly...!?

title.en: Akuyaku Reijo no Ani ni Tensei Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の兄に転生しました

description.en:
"Onii-tama?"
Cain, who reincarnated as one of the love interests of an otome game, screamed at the loveliness of his sister, Diana. I can't believe that this angel is going to be a villainess with countless bad ends-- No, there is no way that such a future can exist! Clenching his fist tightly, he raises his sister into a gentle lady, while also dispelling the darkness held by the love interests in place of the heroine. Relying on his game knowledge from his previous life and an orphaned chamberlain. Everything for his beloved sister--
description.id:
"Abwang?"

Cain, orang yang baru saja bereinkarnasi menjadi salah satu target kencan di sebuah otome game, tiba-tiba berteriak karena melihat keimutan adik perempuannya, Diana.
Aku tidak menyangka kalau malaikat kecil ini akan menjadi seorang villainess dengan akhir yang tragis-- Tidak, aku tidak akan membiarkan masa depan seperti itu terjadi!
Dengan mengepalkan tangannya, dia bertekat untuk membesarkan adik perempuannya menjadi seorang wanita yang baik hati dan tidak sombong, sembari menghilangkan segala masa lalu yang buruk dari para target kencan lain menggantikan sang tokoh utama.
Bergantung pada pengetahuannya tentang gamenya di kehidupan yang dulu dan juga pengalamannya sebagai anak yatim piastu, semuanya dilakukan demi adik perempuannya-- dan akhirnya, tantangan bagi sang kakak akan dimulai sekarang!
description.ja: ゲーム実況中に過労死し、乙女ゲームのキャラ・カインに転生した俺は、妹・ディア―ナの圧倒的可愛さに心を奪われた。しかし、このままゲーム世界が進んでいけば、妹は辺境の地で凌辱されたり、暗殺者に殺される壮絶なバットエンドを迎えると決まっていた。「この世界で妹を幸せにする!!」そう誓った俺は妹を淑女に育てながら、ゲームのシナリオに逆らっていく。そう、すべては愛する妹のため……。「おにーたま、ディ、にんじんもたべたのです!」「えらい! ディアーナは何て素晴らしいんだ!!!」

description.en:
From Del Rey:  
Little witch-girls Chocolat and Vanilla are best friends, but only one of them can be Queen of the Magic World. To determine who deserves the title, they must go to the Human World and enter a strange competition. Whoever attracts the most human boys wins! The girls had planned to be best friends forever, but both of them want to be Queen. Will their rivalry ruin their friendship?  
  
---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Children in 2005**

“I was given a building as an inheritance?”

From a nobody who does all kinds of odd jobs and lived a hard life, he was given a chance to become a landlord right in the middle of Gangnam!

But, the condition for this inheritance is to ‘operate a restaurant for 5 years.’

‘Moreover, I can sense a chill down my spine thanks to the weird customers that came in for today’s store opening……Do I really just need to prepare food?’

“So then…all the guests who came in yesterday…”

“They were ghosts.”

Every night starting from 11 o’ clock until 1 o’clock, we will now be open!

altTitles.en: 恋するハートでタイホして

description.en:
1) Arrest me with love  
Asuka, a woman detective, wishes to arrest phantom thief Cerberos, who is widely talked about in town, because he kissed her by force…!  
  
2) It will heal eventually if you lick it! ~Kneel down to love~  
Nurse Nana and doctor Hiura are back, but their relationship seems to have encountered a problem as Hiura used his position to transfer his girlfriend Nana in the same department as him. Now working in the pediatrics department Nana gets to know a young patient, Minato-kun, who becomes very attached to Nana, much to Hiura's annoyance!  
  
3) It will heal eventually if you lick it! ~The Santa Claus in a white coat~  
Christmas is close and so is Nana's birthday! She should be happy but the insecurities of hers and Hiura's relationship is piling up and the last straw is when she finds out Hiura has a fiancé?!  
  
4) How much does it cost to love?  
After taking up an acquaintance's debt, Akemi meets the debt collector Shiina who tries to help her pay it off, but after losing job after job Akemi doesn't want to burden Shiina who's taken care of her?

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

altTitles.ja: 内海くんの恋のうた

description.en:
"Wouldn't you like to hear my love song?"

Shiori failed to make friends upon entering school, thus, she spends her time as a loner. The only support for her is the music of her favourite singer "Kanade," and she eagerly awaits the release of his new song. Then, by chance, she finds out that  this "Kanade" is actually her classmate, Utsumi! She can't believe she's about to meet her crush in real life, but to her suprise, once they're face to face, Utsumi asks her to be his girlfriend so he can experience love to be able to write a love song. 

A pure, heart-pounding love story that will make your heart skip a beat!

title.en: Yamiochi Yuusha no Haishin Haishin~Tsuihousare, Kakushi Boss Beya ni Hourikomareta Kekka, Boss to Tansakushagari Haishin wo Hajimeru~@comic

altTitles.ja: 闇堕ち勇者の背信配信~追放され、隠しボス部屋に放り込まれた結果、ボスと探索者狩り配信を始める~@comic

description.en:
Fifty years have passed since dungeons first appeared on Earth. Dungeon exploration and live streaming are considered the norm for the people.

Kuga, who became a dungeon explorer alongside his close friends, ends up being banished from his party due to him being a supposed "jack of all trades, master of none" hero.

Amidst his despair, Kuga finds himself thrown into the hidden boss room, famous for making explorers unable to step foot into a dungeon ever again. There, he encounters a beautiful female vampire named Alicia.

Though he’s prepared to meet his end, Alicia, captivated by the so-called streaming, has other plans and asks him, "Could you teach me how to stream?"

With nowhere else to go, Kuga reluctantly accepts her proposal and thus begins their unprecedented dungeon explorer-hunting streams.

For some reason, their stream quickly went viral like crazy, and Kuga then began to awaken some unknown powers...?

And meanwhile, something strange is happening to the party members who banished Kuga...

description.en:
It was just a usual morning.  
  
Akira Shiroyanagi, a high schooler who loves games and Konpeito (Japanese sweets), is suddenly dragged into a battlefield by a mysterious girl who calls herself Mion. The participants are told that they are "erased from the family register, involved in an experiment, and have gained certain powers."  
  
Akira is determined to win the game with his newfound powers and destroy the organization. Armed with a power no one expects and his "brain" skills, a new era of intelligence battle of begins!

altTitles.ja: MAIDes─メイデス─メイド、地獄の戦場に転送される。固有のゴミ収集魔法で、最弱クラスのまま人類最強に。@COMIC

altTitles.en: Maid, transported to the hellish battlefield, with only her unique garbage collection magic,  stays the weakest class yet becomes humanity's strongest.

description.en:
"……W-what should I do? I’m being transported to the battlefield of hell!"

In the midst of the war against the demonic beasts, where humanity faces the threat of extinction, the maid girl Orsela accidentally finds herself transferred to a forest on the front lines of the battlefield. She has no weapons or combat experience; all she possesses is her seemingly useless inherent magic, which can only summon things that people no longer need.

When she encounters a large magical beast—a dragon—and finds herself in a desperate, life-threatening situation, she gambles everything and summons a magical weapon: a revolver, and a battle-crazed girl of heroic class!?

The magic that was thought to be useless turns out to be more suited for battle than any other magic...

Before she knows it, she becomes the last bastion protecting humanity!

The weakest class maid carves out a future for mankind!
A survival fantasy of rising to the top in a world on the brink of collapse begins!

altTitles.ja: 包帯ごっこ

description.en: Hirose Itsuki is a high school girl who is afraid of getting hurt. One day, Hino, a celebrity at school who quit basketball because of an injury, asks her, "Do you know any good ways to pass the time?" Hino asks her if she knows of any good ways to pass the time, and they end up studying together. Itsuki then gradually becomes aware of Hino. A pure love story of a medical student begins!

altTitles.ja: ローゼンメイデン

description.en: After a traumatic incident, Jun Sakurada refuses to interact with the outside world and return to school–he even shuts out his sister, his closest friend. Jun spends most of his time online buying spiritual items that are obvious rip-offs. One day he finds a website that curiously enough asks him to put his order in his desk drawer. Thinking it's a joke, Jun plays along. The following day a suitcase arrives containing a doll named Shinku… that comes to life before his very eyes! Welcome to the world of Rozen Maiden, where Jun must enter an all-new reality to protect and serve a living doll…
description.pt-br: Depois de um incidente traumático, Jun Sakurada se recusa a interagir com o mundo exterior e a voltar para a escola, até mesmo evitando sua irmã, sua amiga mais próxima. Jun passa a maior parte do tempo online comprando itens espirituais que são claramente fraudes. Um dia, ele encontra um site que, de forma curiosa, pede para ele colocar o pedido na gaveta de sua mesa. Pensando que é uma brincadeira, Jun participa. No dia seguinte, uma mala chega contendo uma boneca chamada Shinku... que ganha vida diante de seus olhos! Bem-vindo ao mundo de Rozen Maiden, onde Jun deve entrar em uma realidade completamente nova para proteger e servir uma boneca viva...

By the Furnace of Miss Alice’s House

description.en:
After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past...

Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.
description.pt-br: Depois de 10 anos, Alice volta de Tóquio para a sua cidade natal e mora sozinha em uma antiga casa tradicional Japonesa com lareira. Harumi, um amigo de infância, estava animado para se encontrar novamente depois de muito tempo, mas o calor da lareira com Alice continua tão quente quanto no passado...

altTitles.ja: タナカの異世界成り上がり

description.en:
Tanaka, a 32-year-old man, gets caught up as a bystander while the hero is summoned to another world. His stats are mediocre and skills are unremarkable, but Tanaka remains positive and decides to have fun in this new world, saying, "Since I'm here, I want to use magic!" 

What will he encounter on his journey while meeting reliable companions?!

altTitles.ja: ツいてる彼女

description.en: Yukimi has the misfortune of being very easily possessed by spirits, and realizes that she has been cursed with a guardian ghost. And so all of her dates with men end badly. When she goes to the temple to ask for an exorcism, the good-looking head priest suddenly proposes to her!? Is this lucky? Or unlucky?

He stood at the pinnacle of the world. Surpassing all since birth in the art of the sword. But fate has left him crippled moments before reaching the apex. But the story continues and the legend will rise again…

---
- **Note:** 2nd Place in 15th Chinese Golden Dragon Manhua Awards
description.fr: Il se tenait au sommet du monde. Surpassant tout depuis la naissance dans l'art de l'épée. Mais le destin l'a laissé infirme quelques instants avant d'atteindre le sommet. Mais l'histoire continue et la légende renaîtra…
description.zh: 天下最风流的剑客，名曰沈三公子。 天下最有名的剑法，唤作万藏剑经。 天下最强大最神秘的地方，是为弃剑山庄。 每周六早上九点准时更新~

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive: Cuộc phiêu lưu của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game

description.en: From the hit game Blue Archive, comes a spin-off manga featuring the Game Development Department! Where Momoi, Midori, Yuzu and Aris share their days of youth, friendship, and clumsy moments.
description.ja: 人気ゲーム「ブルーアーカイブ」よりゲーム開発部のスピンオフが登場！モモイ、ミドリ、ユズ、アリスの4人が送る青春、友情、ぽんこつの日々...。
description.ru: Спин-офф манга по мотивам популярной игры Blue Archive, в которой девочки из отдела разработки игр делятся смешными историями о своей юности и дружбе. Это душевная и милая история, созданная мастером комедии Мидзу Асато!
description.vi: Bộ truyện chuyển thể từ trò chơi đang làm mưa làm gió "Blue Archive" với sự xuất hiện của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game! Nơi Momoi, Midori, Yuzu và Arisu cùng nhau sẻ chia những năm tháng của tuổi trẻ, tình bạn và những khoảnh khoắc vụng về. Đây là một câu chuyện ấm lòng, hài hước và dễ thương từ Bậc thầy Truyện hài Mizu Asato!

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Thợ Săn là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy. Từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến nhưng cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Thợ Săn với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi được 12 tuổi Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào "Cuộc thi Thợ Săn Kỳ Tài", ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapica, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một người Thợ Săn... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

altTitles.ja: 花月姫

description.en: When Lys was born, her heart did not beat at all. To save her, her mother made a contract with a devil: Lys can borrow his heart until the day she turns 16, but after that, he will eat her body. Together with her companion, Siva, someone she met by chance on the desert at night, she travels around as a dancer girl to find the devil who sealed her fate. One day, while they were traveling, they suddenly meet an egoistic prince and a ring spirit… A Thousand and One Nights romance between the devil and the young girl.
description.pl: Manga ta opowiada o 15 letniej tancerce brzucha imieniem Lys jest ona człowiekiem zwanym Hanatsuki. na jej piersi widnieje piękny kwiat będący symbolem powiązania jej życia z demonem który uratował jej życie gdy po urodzeniu nie mogła złapać oddechu. Demon ten oddał jej swe serce jednak jedynie na 16 lat, i w jej następne urodziny dziewczyna będzie musiała umrzeć. We wszystkich przygodach Lys towarzyszy jej tajemniczy grajek Siva który broni ją przed każdym niebezpieczeństwem i malutki dżin zamieszkały w pierścieniu. Komiks ten dzieje się gdzieś na dalekim wschodzie i swym klimatem bardzo przypomina baśnie z tysiąca i jednej nocy

altTitles.ja: ゴーアンゴー

description.en: Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

altTitles.en: Wei Jun is not afraid of dying

description.en: After finding out that he becomes invincible after dying, Wei Jun began finding ways to die frantically. Then, he discovered that something was wrong with the world. He knocked the rich kid to the ground, but the rich kid instead praised him and asked for another slap. He scolded the Emperor like a dog, but the Emperor swore that Wei Jun shall have immunity for life. He forcibly embraced the waist of the proud and unsociable goddess, but she just said that she will only be his from now on! Wei Jun: “Stop it! I just want to die, why is it so hard?”
description.zh: 魏君确认自己被杀死后就能直接无敌，于是他开始疯狂作死。然后，他发现这个世界有毒。 他把纨绔干翻在地，纨绔夸他打得好，最好再来一巴掌。 他把狗皇帝骂到狗血淋头，狗皇帝竟发誓护他一世周全。 他替天煞孤星女神捕撑腰，神捕表示这辈子只能以身相许了。魏君：别闹！我只是想死，怎么就这么难呢？

title.en: Ore to Kimitachi no Dungeon Sensou

altTitles.en: Dungeon War Between You and Me

altTitles.zh-hk: 我和你們的地下城戰爭

altTitles.ja: 俺と君達のダンジョン戦争

description.en:
In the year 2045AD, Earth is invaded by four different worlds. To defend the planet, one must conquer the dungeons connected to each of these other worlds.  Each country selects Explorers to take on this task, and Gunma, an ordinary man chosen in Japan, is suddenly thrown into the front lines of the attack! 

Scared and overequipped, he activates his [Listening[ and [EnemyDetection] skills. Then, he encounters the strongest and most beautiful girl in all of mankind! While being pushed around by the girl, who is too strong for her own good but has a tofu mentality, he rushes through the dungeon at breakneck speed... 

This is an unprecedented dungeon fantasy that loosely knocks down everything!
description.ja:
西暦2045年、地球は4つの異世界から侵攻された。防衛するには、各異世界と繋がるダンジョンの攻略が必須。その責務を担う《探索者》を各国が選出し、日本で選ばれた平凡男・グンマは突如、攻略最前線に放り込まれてしまう！

ビビりまくり、過度な重装備で〈聞き耳〉や〈索敵〉スキル発動中に出会ったのは、人類最強の美少女!?強すぎてヤベェ割には豆腐メンタルな彼女に振り回されつつ、破竹の勢いでダンジョン攻略を進んでいくのだが…？

ゆるっと全てをなぎ倒す、前人未踏のダンジョンファンタジー！

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティー辞めます。

altTitles.en: I Quit the Party of the Brave.

description.en:
Raniel Van Trias, the Ashen Wizard, is a highly skilled mage set on defeating the Demon King. After years of fighting alongside the renowned Hero's Party and multiple encounters with the Demon King, he is ousted from the party, left with a curse on his heart, forced to lose half his lifespan, and transformed into a woman! 

Undeterred, Raniel becomes an assistant professor at the Royal Apelia Academy as Rania and searches for a way to lift the curse, oblivious to how challenging his task may be...

---

[Official Japanese release](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/148780)

[Official French release](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/1483)
description.ko:
마왕을 무찌르고 세상을 구원하기 위해 모인 최강의 용사파티가 있었다.

하지만 마왕 토벌엔 관심이 없고편한 전장만 찾는 용사 파티에 환멸을 느낀 잿빛 마법사 라니엘은,결국 파티를 때려치우고 고향으로 돌아와 스승을 만난다.그런 그에게 라니엘의 스승인 로셀은명문 아카데미, 아플리아의 조교수 자리를 권하게 된다.

"아니, 이걸 왜 못하지?"
"그냥 회로 생성하고 쓰면 되는데?"

하지만 세계관 최강자도 막상 가르침에는 소질이 없는 듯 한데...

어찌저찌 아플리아 아카데미에 취직하게 된 인류 최강 전력.먼치킨 마법사의 좌충우돌 아카데미 조교수기가 시작된다!

title.en: Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san - Daehaksaengidoen Takagiyang (Doujinshi)

description.en: Nishikata and Takagi have become University students but nothing much changed…
description.pt-br: Nishikata e Takagi tornaram-se estudantes universitários, mas nada mudou muito…

title.en: Onaji Kao de Watashi wa Uso wo Tsuku

altTitles.ja: 同じ顔で私は嘘をつく

altTitles.ja-ro: Onaji Kao de Watashi wa Uso wo Tsuku

description.ja: 私は妹が憎い。人気者の妹が。私は両親が憎い。こんなダメな私に生みやがって。何より私は私が憎い。どうしてこんな私で生きなきゃいけないの。双子の姉・月は、優秀な妹・陽を羨みながらじめじめとした高校生活を過ごしていた。月には酷い呪いがあった。「人に触られると気持ちの悪い幻覚が襲ってくる」そのせいで月は触られるたびに恐怖で叫び、暴れた。幻覚は月にしか見えないため誰にも理解されなかった。とにかく毎日がつらかった。そんな時、陽が大事故に巻き込まれる。悲劇のはずだが、月には光明だった。「今なら私が陽になれるかも――?」哀しき運命に抵抗する、人生逆転入れ替わりサスペンス!
description.vi:
Đây là câu chuyện về Mặt trăng tìm cách thay thế Mặt trời.
Tsuki, một nữ sinh cấp 3 từ nhỏ đã luôn thầm ganh tỵ với Akari, em gái sinh đôi tài giỏi của mình. Mọi chuyện càng tồi tệ hơn khi cô phải gánh trên mình một lời nguyền kinh khủng.
Cho đến một ngày, Akari gặp phải tai nạn. Lẽ ra đó phải là một điều bất hạnh, nhưng với Tsuki, đó lại là một cơ hội! Cơ hội để cô trở thành người em gái có gương mặt giống hệt mình!

altTitles.ja: 仮面ライダーSPIRITS

description.en: After Japanese-American FBI agent Taki Kazuya and Kamen Rider 1 defeat a bat monster, they decide to contact the former riders including Stronger to investigate the appearance of monsters attacking them and civilians. Their investigation reveals the coming of an alien empire out to destroy the Earth, finishing the work that Shocker and other terrorist organizations have failed due to their defeat at the Rider's hands.

title.en: I Was Reincarnated as the Heroine on the Verge of a Bad Ending, and I'm Determined to Fall in Love!

altTitles.ja: バッドエンド目前のヒロインに転生した私、今世では恋愛するつもりがチートな兄が離してくれません！？@COMIC

altTitles.zh: 转生成了即将进入坏结局的女主角，这辈子想要好好恋爱骗子哥哥却不愿对我放手？

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生成了即將進入壞結局的女主角，這輩子想要好好戀愛騙子哥哥卻不願對我放手？

altTitles.ja-ro: Bad End Mokuzen no Heroine ni Tensei shita Watashi, Konse de wa Renai suru Tsumori ga Cheat na Ani ga Hanashite kuremasen!?

description.en: One day, office worker Suzune (Reine) is reborn as Raine, the heroine of a "work-based otome game" that is too far away from romance. She wants to fall in love with a handsome man in this life! However, she finds herself in a world where there is a magical caste system, and to her surprise, she is the lowest rank! Her family treats her coldly and she is on the verge of being expelled from school. ...... Even so, she is undeterred by the "strong mentality" she has developed in her previous life. Practising magic, studying, and increasing the likability of her targets, she runs hard to avoid a bad end and get a sparkling school life! As Rene pushes forward with such a bright and positive attitude, her high-spec brother Julius, with whom she was supposed to be on bad terms, somehow begins to dote on her - or does he? A school fantasy about a strong mental heroine who is loved by everyone!
description.ja: OLの鈴音【れいね】はある日、《恋愛まで程遠すぎる作業系乙女ゲーム》のヒロイン・レーネに転生した。「今世はイケメンと恋したい！」と意気込むのだが、そこは魔法カースト制度が存在する世界で、なんとレーネは最低ランクだった！？家族からは冷遇され、学園では退学目前と逆境続き……。それでも前世で鍛えた“強メンタル”を持つ彼女はくじけない。魔法の練習や勉強、攻略対象の好感度アップにと、バッドエンド回避＆キラキラ学園生活ゲットのためにひた走る！そんな明るく前向きに突き進むレーネを、仲が悪かったはずのハイスぺック兄・ユリウスがなぜか溺愛してきて――？

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิสต์พันธุ์ปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 青のエクソシスト
青の祓魔師

description.en: This world consists of two dimensions joined as one, like a mirror. The first is the world in which the humans live, Assiah. The other is the world of demons, Gehenna. Ordinarily, travel between the two, and indeed any kind of contact between the two, is impossible. However, the demons can pass over into this world by possessing anything that exist within it. Satan may be the king of demons, but there's one thing he doesn't have, and that's a substance in the human world which is powerful enough to contain him! For that purpose he created Rin, his son with a human woman, but will is son agree to his plans? Or will he become something else…? An exorcist?
description.fr: Ce monde se compose de deux dimensions jointes en une seule, comme un miroir. Le premier est le monde dans lequel vivent les humains, Assiah. L’autre est le monde des démons, la géhenne. Habituellement, voyager entre les deux, et même tout type de contact entre les deux, est impossible. Cependant, les démons peuvent passer dans ce monde en possédant tout ce qui existe en son sein. Satan est peut-être le roi des démons, mais il y a une chose qu’il n’a pas, et c’est une substance dans le monde humain qui est assez puissante pour le contenir ! Dans ce but, il a créé Rin, son fils avec une femme humaine, mais le fils acceptera-t-il ses plans? Ou va-t-il devenir autre chose...? Un exorciste ?
description.tr: Dünya, ayna gibi birbirine zıt iki farklı boyuttan oluşmaktaydı: İnsanların yaşadığı Assiah ve iblislerin hüküm sürdüğü Gehenna. Bu iki boyut arasında iletişim ve seyahat mümkün olmamasına rağmen iblisler, insanların ruhlarını ele geçirerek Assiah'a ulaşabiliyorlardı.İblislerin tanrısı Şeytan, kendisini barındırabilecek kadar güçlü bir insan bulamadığı için Gehenna'da sıkışıp kalmıştı. Bunu aşmak için, bir insan kadınından Okumura Rin adında bir çocuk sahibi oldu.Şeytan'ın oğlu, babasına yardım edecek mi, yoksa başka bir şeye mi dönüşecek? Bir ruh kovucuya mı?
description.uk: Дві сторони однієї монети, два виміри, які є віддзеркаленнями один одного - саме з них і складається всесвіт. Перший – це наш матеріальний світ, Ассія. Другий – це світ демонів, Геєна. За звичайних обставин ні подорож, ні який завгодно контакт між ними є неможливим. Проте демони можуть перетнути кордон, у що-небудь вселившись. Сатана - повелитель демонів і король Геєни, жодна жива душа в Ассії не здатна довго витримувати його присутність. І щоб створити сильне вмістилище, він зачав сина з людською жінкою, Ріна. Але чи погодиться Рін з його планами? Чи може все ж захоче стати кимось іншим?.. Екзорцистом?
description.pt-br: Este mundo consiste em duas dimensões unidas como uma só, como um espelho. O primeiro é o mundo em que vivem os humanos, Assiah. O outro é o mundo dos demônios, Gehenna. Normalmente, viajar entre os dois e, na verdade, qualquer tipo de contato entre os dois, é impossível. No entanto, os demônios podem passar para este mundo possuindo qualquer coisa que exista dentro dele. Satanás pode ser o rei dos demônios, mas há uma coisa que ele não possui: uma substância no mundo humano que seja poderosa o suficiente para contê-lo! Para isso ele criou Rin, seu filho com uma mulher humana, mas será que seu filho concordará com seus planos? Ou ele se tornará outra coisa...? Um exorcista?

altTitles.en: The Path of the Perfect Evasion Healer

altTitles.ja: 完全回避ヒーラーの軌跡

altTitles.zh-hk: 完全迴避補師的異世界軌跡

description.en: A college student, Sakurai Hiroki was summoned to another world to defeat the Demon Lord. And since he got “Priest” as a job, his starting Recovery Stat was more than enough to heal any wounds, so he dumped all of his Stat Points into Evasion. In other words, he’s aiming for an Evasion Healer who will never get hit by enemy attacks. But unfortunately, people in that world couldn’t understand his ideal! The King got angry against him and labelled him as useless almost immediately! And thus, the story of how Hiroki become an odd Healer who can even avoid Dungeon Boss’ attacks with ease has started!!
description.ru: Учащегося среднего специального образовательного учреждения Сакурай Хироки вызвали в иное измерение для того, чтобы одолеть Лорда Демонов. Поскольку он получит специализацию "Клирика", его базового знания в области восстановления хватило в избытке, чтобы врачевать какие угодно повреждения, и по этой причине он использовал все очки способностей для улучшения уклонения. Иначе говоря, он выбрал дорогу исцелителя, который ни за что не окажется под ударами неприятеля. Однако, к несчастью, народ этого измерения не был в состоянии оценить его по достоинству! Правитель рассердился на героя и моментально нарек его бестолковым. Затем началась история о том, как Хироки становится великолепным мастером исцеления, который может уклоняться от самых жестоких атак боссов.
description.pt-br: Um estudante universitário, Sakurai Hiroki foi convocado para outro mundo para derrotar o Demon Lord. E desde que ele designado como "Sacerdote", seu estado de recuperação inicial foi mais que suficiente para curar qualquer ferida, então ele jogou todos os seus pontos de status em Evasion. Em outras palavras, ele está apontando para uma evasão Healer que nunca vai ser atingido por ataques inimigos. Mas, infelizmente, as pessoas desse mundo não entenderam seu ideal! O rei ficou irritado contra ele e o rotulou como inútil quase imediatamente!E assim, a história de como Hiroki se tornou um Curador estranho que pode até evitar ataques de Dungeon Boss com facilidade começou!!

altTitles.ja: Kiss×Sis
キスシス

description.en: Keita has two step-sisters (without blood-relation) who love him in a lustful way and have no problems expressing it, they even like to compete over it; much to the laughs of his friends (which he usually endures without problems). One day they come to his school to give him his lunch, he gets annoyed due to the atmosphere and explodes on them, to counter attack his anger they confess their tender feelings for him in front of everyone and leave. Feeling sorry he chases after them and says that he'll study hard in order to get in the same highschool as them.
description.it: La storia di Kissxsis inizia con lo studente Keita Suminoe alle prese con gli esami di ingresso per le scuole superiori. Ad aiutarlo ci sono le sue sorelle gemelle più grandi di lui. Le ragazze, Ako e Riko, non hanno alcun legame di sangue con Keita, non fanno nulla per nascondere i propri sentimenti amorosi nei confronti del ragazzo, e si lasciano andare a effusioni ed avances anche in pubblico. I genitori dei tre ragazzi incoraggiano Keita ad accettare le attenzioni di una delle due sorelle, e Keita nonostante l'imbarazzo non disdegna l'interesse delle due ragazze nei suoi confronti. Ako e Riko, nonostante siano tecnicamente rivali fra loro, sono spesso unite e complici nell'escogitare piani per allontanare Keita da qualunque altra ragazza possa girare intorno a lui…
description.pt: Kiss x Sis conta a história de Keita Suminoe, um jovem estudante do ensino fundamental. Ele está vivendo em uma casa com seus pais e suas meio-irmãs gêmeas, Ako e Riko, que o beijam e o assediam sempre competindo para ver quem mostra mais amor por ele. Embora se considerem irmãos eles não compartilham relação sanguínea; seus pais se casaram enquanto eles estavam na infância. Ainda assim, a relação incomoda Keita profundamente, já que seus pais permitem essa relação, e visto que foram criados juntos, e escandaliza à grande parte dos que vêm a saber desta. As gêmeas, contudo, são insistentes, e fazem o possível e o impossível para ficar com ele. Nessa conjuntura, entram outros personagens que possuem esse mesmo interesse, e a trama se desenrola em cima da disputa por Keita.
description.pt-br: Keita tem duas meias-irmãs (sem parentesco) que o amam de uma forma lasciva e não têm problemas em expressar isso, elas até gostam de competir por isso; para as risadas de seus amigos (o que ele geralmente suporta sem problemas). Um dia, elas vêm à escola dele para lhe dar seu almoço, ele fica irritado devido à atmosfera e explode com elas, para contra-atacar sua raiva, elas confessam seus sentimentos ternos por ele na frente de todos e vão embora. Sentindo pena, ele corre atrás delas e diz que vai estudar muito para entrar na mesma escola que elas.

title.en: Itsudemo Jitaku Ni Kaereru Ore Wa, Isekai De Gyoushounin O Hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: いつでも自宅に帰れる俺は、異世界で行商人をはじめました

altTitles.en: Peddler in Another World: I Can Go Back to My World Whenever I Want
I Can Always Go Home, so I Started as a Peddler in Another World

altTitles.ka: მე ყოველთვის შემიძლია სახლში წასვლა, ამიტომ დავიწყე როგორც გამყიდველი სხვა სამყაროში

description.en:
"Won't I be able to get filthy rich if I use this skill?"  
  
Continually exploited at work, Amata Shirou quits his job and moves to his grandma's house. When he finds out that it's connected to another world, he comes up with a plan to set up a business selling Japanese goods.   
  
The story of a man getting rich using his skill that converts the currency of the other world to Japanese yen and so forth.

altTitles.ja: 暁のヨナ

altTitles.en: Yona: The Girl Standing in the Blush of Dawn

altTitles.ru: Иона: Девушка, стоящая в лучах рассвета

altTitles.th: กู้บัลลังก์มังกรแดง

altTitles.id: Yona, The Girl Standing in the Blush

description.de: Als einzige Tochter von König Il ist Yona die Prinzessin eines kleinen Reiches namens Koka. Zur Feier ihres 16. Geburtstags kehrt ihr Cousin Su-won, in den sie schon lange verliebt ist, in den Palast zurück. Doch er verfolgt einen finsteren In der Nacht ermordet Su-won Yonas Vater mit seinem Schwert. Yona muss die schreckliche Tat mit ansehen, kann jedoch mit ihrem Leibwächter und Jugendfreund Hak vor den einfallenden Soldaten fliehen. Aber auch außerhalb des Palastes lauern viele Gefahren…
description.en:
Yona is the sole princess of the Kingdom of Kouka, living a luxurious and carefree life as a princess should. She has it all: the finest clothes and cosmetics, the most divine sweets, a loving emperor as a father, and the hottest cousin crush, Soo-won, any girl could ever hope to have. Now, if only her bodyguard, Son Hak, weren't so annoying towards her, and if her hair weren't so red…

But her nearly perfect world quickly shatters as the man she loves, Soo-won, murders her father and the path to his ascension to the throne is assured. Son Hak escapes with Yona, and they lead a life on the run from that point on.

---
Yona reels from the shock of witnessing a loved one’s murder and having to fight for her life. With Hak’s help, she flees the palace and struggles to survive while evading her enemy’s forces. But where will this displaced princess go when all the paths before her are uncertain?
  


---
description.es: El futuro del reino de Kôka se encuentra en manos de la princesa Yona, una joven que ha pasado su vida bajo los atentos cuidados de su padre, el rey, y su escolta Hak. Con motivo de su 16º cumpleaños, su primo Soo-won, de quien está enamorada, viene a visitarla, pero... ¡le aguarda un cruel destino que jamás habría imaginado!
description.fr: Yona, princesse du royaume de Kôka, a grandi dans l’insouciance, choyée par le roi et protégée par son garde du corps et ami d’enfance, le puissant guerrier, Hak. À l’approche de ses 16 ans, Yona est heureuse: son cousin et amour secret, Soo-won, vient lui rendre visite pour célébrer son anniversaire. Mais ce soir-là, une terrible tragédie survient et sa vie va être bouleversée à jamais!
description.id:
“Aku tidak minta banyak-banyak... Asal bisa melihat senyum Suwon, aku sudah sangat bahagia.”

Yona, putri satu-satunya kerajaan Kouka telah lama memendam cinta pada Suwon, sepupunya. Saat ulang tahunnya yang ke-16, Yona bertekad memilih Suwon dan menolak perjodohan yang dipilihkan sang ayah.

Tapi yang terjadi di depan matanya membuat Yona harus kehilangan semuanya... ayahnya, kerajaannya dan cintanya pada Suwon...
description.it: Yona, principessa del Regno di Kouka e unica figlia del re, è cresciuta circondata dalle attenzioni del padre e della sua guardia del corpo Hak. Il giorno dei festeggiamenti per il suo sedicesimo compleanno arriva a corte suo cugino Suwon, di cui è innamorata. La ragazza è al settimo cielo, totalmente ignara del crudele scherzo che il destino ha in serbo per lei... un’attesissima saga fantasy intrisa di romanticismo, tra epiche lotte e antichi regni!
description.ja: 高華王国の姫・ヨナは一人娘のため、優しい父王と幼なじみで護衛のハク達に囲まれ、大切に育てられていた。そして時はヨナ・16歳の誕生日、ヨナは想いを寄せていた従兄のスウォンから簪を贈られ、父へ自分の気持ちを伝えに行く。が、そこには思いも寄らぬ過酷な運命が!?
description.ko:
고화국의 공주인 연화는 일 왕의 보호 아래 세상 일은 전혀 모른 채 항상 성 안에서 지내고 있었으며 그녀의 소꿉친구로는 학과 수원이 있었다. 그러나 부왕 일이 소꿉친구이자 짝사랑 상대였던 사촌 수원의 손에 살해 당하고, 이 광경을 목격한 연화는 16살의 생일에 일생 가장 큰 위기를 겪게 된다.

학의 도움으로 궁을 빠져나온 사이 수원이 고화국의 왕위를 계승하고, 연화는 마음을 추스르며 앞으로의 길을 모색하던 중, 문덕이 얘기한 신관 익수의 신탁을 듣고, 고화국의 건국신화 속 비룡왕을 보필하던 네 용의 후손을 찾는다.
description.pl: Księżniczka Yona, córka władcy państwa Koka, nigdy nie miała poważnych zmartwień. Dość powiedzieć, że za swoje największe nieszczęście uważała fakt, że jej kuzyn, Su-won, w którym skrycie się podkochiwała, nie traktował jej poważnie. Gdy więc młodzieniec przybył do pałacu, aby wziąć udział w uroczystości na cześć szesnastych urodzin księżniczki, ta nie posiadała się z radości. Jednak to właśnie tej nocy cały jej świat miał lec w gruzach. Su-won zamordował jej ojca, a następnie próbował zabić również Yonę. Od niechybnej śmierci uratował ją młody generał, a zarazem przyjaciel księżniczki, Son Hak. Jednak ucieczka z pałacu to dopiero początek. Czy Yona zdoła odnaleźć w sobie dość siły, aby zmierzyć się z okrutną rzeczywistością i odzyskać władzę?
description.ru:
Йона — единственная принцесса королевства Коука. Она ведет роскошную и беззаботную жизнь, как и подобает принцессам. У неё есть всё: лучшая одежда и косметика, превосходные сладости, любящий отец Император Иль, и сильнейшие чувства к кузену Су Вону, о котором многие могли лишь мечтать. Вот только если бы её телохранитель Сон Хак не так раздражал и её волосы не были такими красными.

Все меняется в ночь на шестнадцатый день рождения девушки. Почти идеальный мир быстро рассыпается, когда человек, которого она любит — Су Вон — убил её отца. Путь к его становлению на престол ныне гарантирован. Вместе с Хаком, Йона скрылась из замка в поисках помощи, и с этого момента они ведут жизнь в бегах…
description.th: เรื่องราวของ โยนะ องค์หญิงแห่งอาณาจักรโคกะที่มีเรือนผมหยักศกสีแดงสด เพราะเป็นพระธิดาพระองค์เดียว จึงได้รับการเลี้ยงดูมาอย่างทะนุถนอมโดยพระบิดาผู้อ่อนโยน กับ "ฮาคุ" ซึ่งเป็นทั้งเพื่อนสมัยเด็กและองครักษ์คอยคุ้มกัน และแล้วในวันเกิดอายุ 16 ปีของโยนะ "ซูวอน" ลูกพี่ลูกน้องที่โยนะมีใจให้ ได้มอบปิ่นปักผมเป็นของขวัญ จากนั้นโยนะก็ไปบอกความรู้สึกของตนให้กับบิดาที่คัดค้านการแต่งงานระหว่างเธอกับซูวอนรับรู้ แต่ที่นั่นมีชะตากรรมอันโหดร้ายที่คาดไม่ถึงรอคอยเธออยู่
description.tr: Kouka Krallığı’nın prensesi Yona, tek çocuk olduğu için hem çocukluk arkadaşı hem de koruması Hak ve yumuşak kalpli babası kral tarafından el üstünde tutularak büyütülmüştür. 16. doğum gününde Yona, küçüklüğünden beri hoşlandığı kuzeni Soo-Won’dan bir saç tokası alır. Kendi duygularından emin olan Yona konuşmak için babasının yanına gider. Ancak orada onu beklenmedik zalim bir kader beklemektedir! Bir ülkenin yıkıma nasıl gittiğini anlatan bu tarihi dram ve romantik fantazi başlasın.
description.vi: Yona là công chúa duy nhất của 1 vương quốc, sống cuộc sống xa hoa và vô ưu của 1 công chúa. Cô ấy có tất cả: những bộ quần áo lộng lẫy nhất, mỹ phẩm tuyệt nhất, đồ ngọt ngon nhất, có người cha là hoàng đế hết mực yêu thương, có người anh họ vô cùng điển trai, Soo-won, để ý đến. Nhưng, cô lại có một mái tóc màu đỏ và có một tên vệ sĩ vô cùng phiền nhiễu, Son Hak. Cuộc sống tưởng chừng hoàn hảo đó lại nhanh chóng tiêu tan khi người mà cô yêu, Soo-won, đã giết cha của cô để đảm bảo con đường lên nắm quyền của mình. Son Hak cùng Yona bỏ trốn và sống cuộc sống ẩn mình từ đó. (Lưu ý: Thực sự thì tên trong truyện có vẻ như mang hơi hướng Hàn Quốc, việc dịch phụ thuộc hoàn toàn vào Eng nên có gì các bạn thông cảm nhé, truyện này là manga chứ không phải manhwa đâu :D Hơn nữa chúng tớ cũng ko kiếm được wiki truyện này, có thì cũng chỉ toàn tên như trên thôi TT^TT)
description.pt-br: Yona, única princesa do reino, era apaixonada pelo seu primo e tinha uma vida luxuosamente despreocupada, como toda princesa. Mas tudo muda depois de uma traição que a obriga a fugir do castelo com seu guarda-costas, Son Hak. Nisso, eles descobrem sobre uma lenda que mudará totalmente o destino deles.
description.zh-hk: 從小備受父王及哈克寶貝呵護的高華國公主‧優娜，在她16歲生日的當天，她的心上人蘇芳來到宮殿，並送她漂亮的髮簪。不過優娜的父親並不允許她跟蘇芳的交往，依舊對蘇芳無法死心的優娜決定向父王表明她的心意時，卻意外地撞見父親被刺殺的驚人場面。不肯面對事實的優娜從此便與護衛哈克展開一連串的逃亡生活……

altTitles.ja: バツハレ

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist, Wakou Ichiro, who decides to return home early from work to celebrate his second anniversary with his wife. But, when he opens the door of his house... He finds his wife cheating on him! Although the marriage was short-lived, his life changes again when suddenly, a certain woman appears in front of him?
description.ja: ２度目の結婚記念日。仕事を終えて帰宅した和光市路が目撃したのは見知らぬ男と交わる妻の姿だった──！住み慣れた我が家、幸福な日々、そして愛する人を失った和光だったが、そんな彼の前に現れたのは…！？
description.vi: Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, Wakou Ichiro về nhà sớm để kỷ niệm 2 năm ngày cưới với vợ mình. Nhưng bất ngờ khi mở cửa ra thì... Anh phát hiện vợ mình đang làm tình với người đàn ông khác. Cuộc hôn nhân dù ngắn nhưng cũng làm cuộc sống của anh thay đổi một lần nữa. Bất ngờ một cô gái xuất hiện trước mặt anh, câu truyện vừa hài vừa lứng sẽ bắt đầu?
description.es-la: La historia empieza con el protagonista, Wakou Ichiro, quien decida regresar temprano a casa del trabajo para celebrar su segundo aniversario con su esposa. Pero, cuando abre la puerta de su casa... ¡Se encuentra a su esposa siéndole infiel! A pesar de que matrimonio duró muy poco, su vida vuelve a cambiar cuando de repente, frente a él se aparece cierta mujer... ¡Así comienza una nueva historia, una nueva comedía erótica!

altTitles.ja: 百瀬アキラの初恋破綻中。

altTitles.vi: Mối Tình Đầu Của Akira Momose Đang Trên Bờ Vực Đổ Vỡ

altTitles.pt-br: O Primeiro Amor de Momose Akira em Ruínas

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love Is Coming Apart.

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés du premier amour de Momose Akira.

altTitles.ru: Первая любовь Акиры Момосе терпит крах.

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love is a Failure.

altTitles.es: El primer amor de Momose Akira se derrumba.

altTitles.vi: Mối tình đầu đầy trắc trở của Momose Akira

description.en:
Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire.

Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach.

And there was a “fate” that was more than he could have imagined.
description.es:
Kugayama Hajime, un chico que vive en el campo, se reencuentra con su antigua compañera de clase Momose Akira, a la que solía admirar.

Justo cuando está a punto de observarla desde lejos y disfrutar de su agridulce juventud, Akira se acerca de forma inesperada.

Y el "destino" es mucho más de lo que él pudo haberse imaginado.
description.fr: Kugayama Hajime, un garçon vivant à la campagne, revient vers son ancien camarade de classe Momose Akira, qu'il avait l'habitude d'admirer.Alors qu'il s'apprête à la regarder de loin et à profiter de sa jeunesse aigre-douce, Akira fait une approche inattendue.Et il y a eu un « destin » qui a été plus que ce qu'il aurait pu imaginer.
description.ja:
ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。

彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。

そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。

2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。
description.pl: Kugayama Hajime, chłopiec mieszkający na wsi, spotyka swoją dawną koleżankę z klasy, Momose Akiry, którą podziwiał. Gdy tylko zamierza obserwować ją z daleka i cieszyć się swoją słodko-gorzką młodością, Akira niespodziewanie zbliża się do niego. A za tym kryło się „przeznaczenie”, którego nie mógł sobie nawet wyobrazić.
description.ru: Жизнь Хадзимэ Кугаямы, мальчишки из глухой деревушки, круто меняется, когда в его жизнь возвращается бывшая одноклассница и когда-то недосягаемая мечта — Акира Момосэ. Он планировал просто наблюдать за ней издалека и наслаждаться воспоминаниями о своей юности... Но неожиданно Акира делает первый шаг навстречу. И вот тут начинается нечто гораздо большее, чем он мог себе представить. Следите за их историей и согревайте свои сердца вместе с ними.
description.tr: Taşrada yaşayan bir çocuk olan Kugayama Hajime’nin, eskiden hayranlık duyduğu sınıf arkadaşı Momose Akira geri döner. Tam onu uzaktan izleyip tatlı ekşi gençliğinin tadını çıkarmak üzereyken, Akira beklenmedik bir yaklaşımda bulunur. Ve hayal edebileceğinden de öte bir “kader” ile karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: Kugayama Hajime é um jovem que vive no interior. Sua vida muda quando Momose Akira, uma antiga colega de escola por quem ele sempre foi apaixonado, retorna à cidade. Hajime planejava admirá-la de longe, saboreando um romance juvenil agridoce. Mas, para sua surpresa, Akira toma a iniciativa de se aproximar. O que se desenrola a partir daí é um destino mais surpreendente do que ele jamais poderia ter imaginado.

title.en: Herami Shimai wa Docchi mo Yanderu

altTitles.ja: 平良深姉妹はどっちもヤんでる

altTitles.en: The Yandere Little Sister and the Menhera Big Sister

altTitles.es-la: La hermana pequeña Yandere y la hermana mayor Menhera

altTitles.zh: 平良深姐妹都“病”得不轻

altTitles.vi: Hai chị em nhà Herami bất ổn thực sự!

description.en: Sera, (Real Name: Herami Sera) is an approval-seeking girl (26 years old) who works at a maid cafe. Her younger sister, Kira, is an idol (19 years old) who is rapidly gaining popularity with her cool, and mature character. However, the real Kira only ever thinks of her sister and tries to cheer her up in every possible way to help her sister with her mental health and anxiety.
description.ja: せーら（本名：平良深 瀬良）はメイドカフェで働く承認欲求高めな女子（26歳）。そんな彼女の妹・キラは、クールな大人っぽいキャラで人気沸騰中のアイドル（19歳）。しかし、素顔のキラはいつも姉のことしか考えておらず、不安を抱える姉のため、あらゆる手段で励まそうとしていて…。
description.es-la: Sera, (Nombre real: Herami Sera) es una chica que busca aprobación (26 años) que trabaja en un maid café. Su hermana menor, Kira, es una ídolo (19 años) que está ganando popularidad rápidamente con su carácter frío y maduro. Sin embargo, la verdadera Kira solo piensa en su hermana y trata de animarla de todas las maneras posibles para ayudar a su hermana con su salud mental y ansiedad.

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

altTitles.en: A Black Cat's Suite of Love
A Black Cats Suite of Love
La Suite D'amour Du Chat Noir

description.en:
There's a witch that makes your wildest dreams come true. She can make any wish of yours come true, in exchange for something precious. These are the stories about five different wishes.  
  
Includes the stories:  
  
- Kuroneko Renai Kumikyoku (The Black Cat's Love Suite)  
Have you heard of the world where a witch and her black cat live happily together? It's a paradise where nothing bad happens and no one gets sad. But then, the witch dies and the cat is left alone. Somehow, she [the cat] appears to become human. What is the fate of the black cat who searches for her witch in the human world?  
  
- Kioku no Mori (Forest of Memories)  
  
- Manatsu no Gin no Yume (Misdummer's Silver Dream)  
  
- Koori no Netsudo (The Ice's Temperature)  
  
- Tokiiro Meikyuu (Labyrinth of Time and Color)  
  
[PL] ||Gdzieś tam jest czarownica, która sprawi, że spełnią się twoje najdziksze marzenia. Może spełnić każde twoje życzenie w zamian za coś cennego. Te historie są o pięciu różnych życzeniach: Czarne koty uwielbiają garnitury, Las Wspomnień, Srebrny Sen Letni, Ciepło Lodu, Labirynt Czasu i Kolorów.||

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 4 「Let's Save the Royal Academy Library!」

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～第四部 貴族院の図書館を救いたい!

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

description.en:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)

altTitles.es-la: Regreso del ranker de clase SSS

description.en:
What would you do with the chance to become far greater than your greatest rivals… before they could even start?

When a dominant guild gangs up on Rokan to humiliate him and destroy his hard-earned achievements in the world's most realistic fantasy VR game, he becomes desperate for revenge. But just when Rokan thinks he's lost it all, a twist in space-time sends him back to right before the game is even launched.

Now, this former SSS-class ranker sees the perfect opportunity to return to glory!
description.ko:
가상현실 게임 더 로드(The Lord)에서 최강자로 군림한 '폭력의 왕' 로칸.
적대 길드에서 내린 척살령으로 모든 것을 잃게 된다.
그런데, 자고 일어나니 3년 전 과거로 회귀했다!

"빌어먹을 자식들아, 기다려라. 모조리 씹어 먹어줄 테니까!"

과거로 회귀하여 다시 한 번 최강자로 군림하는 로칸의 이야기가 시작된다!
description.pt-br:
Lokan era o ‘Rei da Violência’ que reinou como o mais forte no jogo de realidade virtual, ‘The Lord’. Infelizmente, a ordem de assassinato emitida por uma guilda inimiga fez com que ele perdesse tudo. Para sua surpresa, da próxima vez que acordou, ele havia voltado três anos no tempo!

“Vermes do caralho, espere. Vou devorar todos vocês!”

Uma nova história começa quando Lokan, que viajou de volta no tempo, sobe de volta ao topo!

altTitles.ja: 純猥談

description.en:
A gather of affairs and personal experiences which will leave you divided on whether you should sympathize with them or not. Jun Waidan relates real events around love, sex and tears in a manga format. Each chapter tells a different story someone wanted to share.
